mapper.insert: call P_MEMBER_ADD( #{mbr_id}, #{mbr_nm}, #{mbr_pw}, #{mbr_zip}, #{mbr_addr}, #{mbr_daddr}, #{mbr_telno}, #{mbr_eml_addr}, #{mbr_eml_addr_yn}, #{p_errcode, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p_errmsg, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.MBR_ID, A.MBR_NM, A.MBR_PW, A.MBR_ZIP, A.MBR_ADDR, A.MBR_DADDR, A.MBR_TELNO, A.MBR_EML_ADDR, A.MBR_EML_ADDR_YN, B.MBR_POINT_NY, B.MBR_GRADE_CODE, B.MBR_ACCUMULATE_MY FROM MEMBER_TBL A, MEMBER_DETAIL_TBL B WHERE A.MBR_ID = B.MBR_ID AND A.MBR_ID = #{mbr_id}
SELECT MBR_ID FROM MEMBER_TBL WHERE MBR_EML_ADDR = #{mbr_eml_addr} AND MBR_NM = #{mbr_nm}
SELECT MBR_ID FROM MEMBER_TBL WHERE MBR_EML_ADDR = #{mbr_eml_addr} AND MBR_ID = #{mbr_id}
